vibesExplanation:
The vibe 'The Masterclass Workout' is chosen because the workout focuses on improving posture and upper body strength, which are key elements of skill-building and technique. Using resistance bands suggests a focus on precision and controlled movement, fitting this vibe with a score of 0.7. The workout's duration of 15 minutes is in line with focused, technique-driven sessions rather than extended endurance efforts.

'Rhythmic Powerhouse' is also relevant due to the playlist featuring upbeat dance and global hits, implying a music-infused workout experience. This is also supported by the 'Dance mid, Global Hits' radio stations, suggesting a beat-driven atmosphere typically indicative of this vibe, earning it a score of 0.6.

Other vibes were excluded due to the focus on strength and technique over endurance or agility, as well as the structured nature of a mat-based workout.
